name: Persona Structure
description: Ingmar Bergman's psychological narrative exploring identity, performance, and authentic self
distribution_philosophy: Based on Bergman's psychological structure emphasizing identity crisis and the dissolution of personas

established_persona.name: Established Persona
established_persona.description: The protagonist's public identity and social mask are established

cracks_appear.name: Cracks Appear
cracks_appear.description: The persona begins to show signs of strain and instability

identity_crisis.name: Identity Crisis
identity_crisis.description: The protagonist faces a fundamental crisis of identity

dissolution.name: Dissolution
dissolution.description: The persona completely breaks down, revealing the authentic self

reconstruction.name: Reconstruction
reconstruction.description: A new understanding of self emerges from the breakdown
